page.title: 18 Changes in Shipton
page.content: The main change in Shipton is on the A19 50 years ago 1 vehicle would pass by about every 2 hours but now 9 vehicles pass every minute.Older people have told us that they could play on the road.We wouldn't now because its to dangerous.Activites for children have changed,there was more sport in the village and people played with the whip & top.One farmer told us that he used to go pole volting over the land around Shipton.We can't do that now because there are crops in the fields.We interviewed Mrs Holiday who has lived in Shipton for 68 years she came in 1917 she told us about house work and washing day they washed in a wash house with a copper which held rain water and a fire underneath to heat the water.They had 2 peggy tubs 1 peggy stick and a wringing machine soap powder is alot different.
